usa: The Roosevelt Corollary to the Monroe Doctrine was issued.<sup id="cite_ref-15" class="reference">[15]</sup>
The Panama Canal Zone was acquired by the United States from France for $40 million.<sup id="cite_ref-16" class="reference">[16]</sup>
United States presidential election, 1904: President Theodore Roosevelt was reelected to a second term, defeating New York Appeals Court Judge Alton B. Parker.[17]
